description: DB/Cache configuration depends on the base NestJS application structure.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all data persistence and caching work.

description: Integration testing for the registration endpoint can only begin after the endpoint is implemented.
mitigation_plan: QA can write test stubs in parallel based on the API contract.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of the core registration feature.

description: The JWT validation strategy cannot be built until the JWT generation process is defined and implemented.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks implementation of all API endpoint security.

description: The E2E test for logout and token invalidation requires the blocklist check to be integrated into the JWT strategy.
mitigation_plan: Develop test case in parallel with implementation.
impact_if_delayed: Delays verification of a critical security feature.

description: The logic to cancel a pending deletion depends on the logic that creates the pending deletion request and schedules the job.
mitigation_plan: Ensure API contracts for the job scheduler are clear.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the user retention path for the deletion feature.
